title: Software Development Proposal - Customer Management System

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: TechCorp Solutions is pleased to submit this comprehensive proposal for your customer management system project. With over 8 years of experience in enterprise software development, we have successfully delivered similar solutions to companies across various industries.

sections.title: Technical Approach
sections.content: Our proposed solution utilizes a modern microservices architecture built on React and Node.js, ensuring scalability and maintainability. The system will integrate seamlessly with your existing CRM through RESTful APIs.

sections.title: Project Timeline
sections.content:
Phase 1: Discovery & Planning (3 weeks)
Phase 2: System Architecture (4 weeks)
Phase 3: Core Development (20 weeks)
Phase 4: Testing & Deployment (5 weeks)
Total: 32 weeks
